Package game.skills

Class StabStepSkill

java.lang.Object
game.skills.Skill
game.skills.StabStepSkill
public class StabStepSkill extends Skill
A subclass of Skill that represents a Stab and Step skill. This skill can be used to attack an enemy and then move away. This skill requires a certain percentage of stamina to use.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • activateSkill

      public String activateSkill(Actor actor, SkillWeapon weapon, Actor target, GameMap map, String direction)
      Activate the skill. This method will attack the target and then move to a random location.
      Overrides:
      activateSkill in class Skill
      Parameters:
      actor - The actor that uses the skill
      weapon - The weapon that has the skill
      target - The target to be attacked by this skill
      map - The map that the actor is currently in
      direction - The direction of the target from the actor
      Returns:
      A string describing the result of the skill activation
